name: ObsidianGD Badges
description: Adds a badge to ObsidianGD members' profiles.

issues.info: You may report issues with the mod in the ObsidianGD-Badges repository

show-profile.name: Display On Profile
show-profile.description: Display member badges on the profile page.

show-comments.name: Display On Comments
show-comments.description: Display member badges on comment cells.

err-notifs.name: Web Error Notifications
err-notifs.description: Display a notification when the badge web request fails.

web-once.name: Check Badges Once
web-once.description: Only send one web request to check a user's badge, instead of checking as much as the rate limit supports.

console.name: Log In Console
console.description: Log all mod actions in the console.
